user.title: New Horticulture Assistant entry
user.description: Choose how you want to get started. You can create your first plant profile now or skip and add one later from the profile manager.

post_setup.title: New entry for Horticulture Assistant
post_setup.description: This integration is already set up. Open the Horticulture Assistant entry, choose Configure → Options, then pick Open profile manager to edit existing plants. Continue here to create another plant profile.

profile.title: Create plant profile
profile.description: Name your plant and choose how you want to organise its data.

threshold_source.title: How should we set targets?
threshold_source.description: Choose how you want to populate thresholds for this profile.

threshold_copy.title: Copy profile targets
threshold_copy.description:
Select an existing profile or library template to copy thresholds, sensors, and metadata from. Use the filter field to narrow long lists, or apply keywords such as `source:library` or `scope:individual` to focus results.

missing_lineage_species.title: Profile missing species reference
missing_lineage_species.description: {profile_name} ({profile_id}) points to species {species_id}, but that species profile was not found. Update the profile to use a valid species or create the missing species profile.

missing_lineage_parent.title: Profile missing parent reference
missing_lineage_parent.description: {profile_name} ({profile_id}) lists {parent_id} as a parent profile, but it could not be loaded. Remove the invalid parent reference or create the missing profile to restore inheritance.

invalid_profile_schema.title: Profile failed schema validation
invalid_profile_schema.description: {profile_name} ({profile_id}) contains invalid overrides: {issue_summary}. Update the profile JSON or remove the bad values and reload Horticulture Assistant.

dataset_health_failure.title: Reference dataset failed to load
dataset_health_failure.description: {dataset_label} ({dataset_path}) could not be loaded: {error}. Fix or remove the dataset override, then reload Horticulture Assistant.

onboarding_stage_failure.title: Setup step failed
onboarding_stage_failure.description: The {stage} step failed while setting up Horticulture Assistant: {error}. Check the logs, fix the issue, then reload the integration.
